0: As I lay me down to sleep
1: I hear her speak to me
3: I think the storm ran out of rain, the clouds are movin'
4: I know you're happy, cause I can see it
5: So tell the voice inside ya head to believe it
6: I talked to God about you, he said he sent you an angel
7: And look at all that he gave you
8: You asked for one and you got two
9: You know I never left you
10: Cause every road that leads to heaven's right inside you
13: Oh, the good outweighs the bad even on your worst day
15: Hey hey one day, you'll be the man you always knew you could be
16: And if you knew how proud I was
17: You'd never shed a tear, have a fear, no you wouldn't do that
18: And though I didn't pick the day to turn the page
19: I know it's not the end every time I see her face, and I hear you say
23: Hello my only one, remember who you are
24: You got the world cause you got love in your hands
25: And you're still my chosen one
26: So can you understand? One day you'll understand
title: Only One
